# NSAlert.Style.warning

**Case**

An alert style to warn someone about a current or impending event.

## Declaration

```swift
case warning
```

## Discussion

Use this style of alert when the alert’s content is more severe than [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAlert/Style/informational] but less severe than [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAlert/Style/critical]. This is the default alert style.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSAlert.Style.critical**: An alert style to inform someone about a critical event.
- **NSAlert.Style.informational**: An alert style to inform someone about a current or impending event.
